problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not comply with the minimum number of PNCs (four visits)
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women comply with the minimum number of PNCs (four visits)
action: Compliance with the minimum number of PNCs (four visits)

message.English: Dear pregnant women; visit prenatal consultations (PNC) at least four times as recommended to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice that can help ensure your health and that of your unborn child
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes; consultez au moins quatre fois les services de consultation pré-natale (CPN) tel que recommandé pour bénéficier des soins préventifs et curatifs, des conseils pouvant contribuer à garantir votre santé et celle de votre futur bébé.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not respect preventive measures against malaria (IPT/SP and sleeping under the LLIN)
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women apply preventive measures against malaria (IPT/SP and sleep under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN))
action: Implementation of malaria prevention measures (IPT/SP and sleeping under the LLIN)

message.English: Dear pregnant women, sleep every night under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN) to avoid malaria which is harmful to your health and that of your baby
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, dormez toutes les nuits sous la Moustiquaire Imprégnée d’Insecticide à Longue Durée d’Action (MILD) pour éviter la malaria nuisible pour votre santé et celle de votre bébé.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not have a birth plan
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women develop a birth plan
action: Development of a birth plan

message.English: Pregnant women, discuss your birth plan with your healthcare providers during prenatal consultation (PNC) so that you can receive quality care during your delivery to safeguard your health, your life and the life of your unborn child.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes discutez du plan d’accouchement avec les prestataires lors de la consultation pré-natale (CPN) afin de recevoir des soins de qualité lors de l’accouchement, pour préserver votre santé et garantir votre survie et celle de votre futur bébé.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women do not seek help from the HC in time when faced with danger signs
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women are aware of the danger signs of pregnancy and seek help from a healthcare facility in time
action: Consultation on the occurrence of a danger sign

message.English: Dear pregnant women, set up your birth plan according to the healthcare providers' guidelines to guarantee your health and that of your unborn child.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, mettez en place votre plan d'accouchement suivant les orientations des prestataires pour garantir votre santé et celle de votre futur bébé.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women delay going to the health center in case of danger signs or childbirth
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women decide in time to seek help from the health center in case of danger signs or childbirth
action: Non-use of indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery; Follow-up of…

message.English: Dear pregnant woman, when you notice any of the following signs: bleeding, pain in the lower abdomen, loss of water, high fever, go immediately to the health center to receive appropriate care.
message.French: Chère femme enceinte, lorsque vous constatez l’un des signes suivants: saignement, douleurs au bas ventre, perte des eaux, forte fièvre, rendez-vous immédiatement au centre de santé pour recevoir des soins appropriés.

problem_behavior: Pregnant women use certain indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery
promoted_behavior: Pregnant women do not use indigenous products to speed up labor and delivery
action: Informing the woman of the danger signs during…

message.English: Dear pregnant women, go give birth in a health facility to benefit from assisted childbirth and ensure quality care for yourself and your baby.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, allez accoucher dans la formation sanitaire pour bénéficier de l’accouchement assisté et vous assurer des soins de qualités et ceux de votre bébé.

problem_behavior: The husband/spouse is not interested in the pregnant woman's health and ignores danger signs
promoted_behavior: The husband/spouse is interested in the pregnant woman's health and knows the danger signs
action: The husband/spouse is involved in the pregnant woman's health and knows the danger signs

message.English: Dear husband/spouse, go with your pregnant wives to the nearest health center, in order to ensure the harmony of the couple, the blossoming of the woman and a healthy development of the pregnancy
message.French: Chers mari/conjoint, accompagnez vos femmes enceintes au centre de santé le plus proche, en vue d’assurer l’harmonie du couple, l’épanouissement de la femme et une bonne évolution de la grossesse.

problem_behavior: The husband/spouse does not go with the pregnant woman to PNC.
promoted_behavior: The husband/spouse goes with the pregnant woman to prenatal consultations (PNC)
action: Escorting the pregnant woman to the PNC

message.English: Fathers, husbands/spouses, listen carefully: the prenatal consultation allows the pregnant woman to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice on her lifestyle and guarantees her health and that of her unborn child. Thanks to the 4 recommended PNC visits, detection of complications, screening and treatment of infections and other diseases that may occur during pregnancy as well as prevention of transmission of mother-child diseases to ensure good health, harmony of the couple, fulfillment of the woman and a good progress of the pregnancy. In order to reduce the dangers associated with pregnancy and childbirth, pregnant women should follow the following six preventive actions: 1. Tetanus vaccination; 2. HIV testing to protect the baby; 3. Take the indicated dose of iron and folic acid to avoid anemia; 4. Enriching meals, especially during the first 3 months of pregnancy; 5. Use iodized salt to prevent spontaneous abortion or premature delivery; 6. Sleep under an impregnated net and take the indicated dose of medication to prevent malaria.
message.French: Pères, mari/conjoint, écoutez bien: la consultation prénatale   permet à la femme enceinte bénéficier des soins préventifs et curatifs, des conseils sur son le mode de vie et garantit sa santé et celle de son futur bébé. Grace aux 4 visites de consultation pré-natale (CPN) recommandées, la détection des complications, le dépistage et le traitement des infections et autres maladies qui peuvent survenir au cours de la grossesse ainsi que la prévention de la transmission de maladies mère-enfant pour assurer la bonne santé, l’harmonie du couple, l’épanouissement de la femme et une bonne évolution de la grossesse. Afin de réduire les dangers liés à la grossesse et à l’accouchement, les femmes enceintes doivent suivre les six actions préventives suivantes: 1. La vaccination contre le tétanos; 2. Le dépistage du VIH pour protéger le bébé; 3. Prendre la dose indiquée de fer et acide folique pour éviter l'anémie; 4. Enrichir les repas, surtout pendant les 3 premiers mois de grossesse; 5. Consommer du sel iodé pour éviter un avortement spontané ou un accouchement prématuré; 6. Dormir sous une moustiquaire imprégnée et en prendre la dose indiquée de médicaments pour éviter le paludisme.

promoted_behavior: The husband/spouse decides to seek help from a healthcare facility in case of in case of danger signs or childbirth

message.English: Fathers, husbands/spouses, listen carefully: the prenatal consultation allows the pregnant woman to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice on her lifestyle and guarantees her health and that of her unborn child. Thanks to the 4 recommended PNC visits, detection of complications, screening and treatment of infections and other diseases that may occur during pregnancy as well as prevention of transmission of mother-child diseases to ensure good health, harmony of the couple, fulfillment of the woman and a good progress of the pregnancy. In order to reduce the dangers associated with pregnancy and childbirth, pregnant women should follow the following six preventive actions:1. Tetanus vaccination; 2. HIV testing to protect the baby; 3. Take the indicated dose of iron and folic acid to avoid anemia; 4. Enriching meals, especially during the first 3 months of pregnancy; 5. Use iodized salt to prevent spontaneous abortion or premature delivery; 6. Sleep under an impregnated net and take the indicated dose of medication to prevent malaria.

Afin de réduire les dangers liés à la grossesse et à l’accouchement, les femmes enceintes doivent suivre les six actions préventives suivantes: 1. La vaccination contre le tétanos; 2. Le dépistage du VIH pour protéger le bébé; 3. Prendre la dose indiquée de fer et acide folique pour éviter l'anémie; 4. Enrichir les repas, surtout pendant les 3 premiers mois de grossesse; 5. Consommer du sel iodé pour éviter un avortement spontané ou un accouchement prématuré; 6. Dormir sous une moustiquaire imprégnée et en prendre la dose indiquée de médicaments pour éviter le paludisme.

promoted_behavior: The husband/spouse is supportive of the woman for pregnancy follow-up (communication within the couple, and being aware of one's responsabilities, etc.)

message.English: Fathers, husbands/spouses, listen carefully: the prenatal consultation allows the pregnant woman to benefit from preventive and curative care, advice on her lifestyle and guarantees her health and that of her unborn child. Thanks to the 4 recommended PNC visits, detection of complications, screening and treatment of infections and other diseases that may occur during pregnancy as well as prevention of transmission of mother-child diseases to ensure good health, harmony of the couple, fulfillment of the woman and a good progress of the pregnancy. In order to reduce the dangers associated with pregnancy and childbirth, pregnant women should follow the following six preventive actions:1. Tetanus vaccination; 2. HIV testing to protect the baby; 3. Take the indicated dose of iron and folic acid to avoid anemia; 4. Enriching meals, especially during the first 3 months of pregnancy; 5. Use iodized salt to prevent spontaneous abortion or premature delivery; 6. Sleep under an impregnated net and take the indicated dose of medication to prevent malaria.
message.French: Pères, mari/conjoint, écoutez bien: la consultation prénatale   permet à la femme enceinte bénéficier des soins préventifs et curatifs, des conseils sur son le mode de vie et garantit sa santé et celle de son futur bébé. Grace aux 4 visites de consultation pré-natale (CPN) recommandées, la détection des complications, le dépistage et le traitement des infections et autres maladies qui peuvent survenir au cours de la grossesse ainsi que la prévention de la transmission de maladies mère-enfant pour assurer la bonne santé, l’harmonie du couple, l’épanouissement de la femme et une bonne évolution de la grossesse. Afin de réduire les dangers liés à la grossesse et à l’accouchement, les femmes enceintes doivent suivre les six actions préventives suivantes: 1. La vaccination contre le tétanos; 2. Le dépistage du VIH pour protéger le bébé; 3. Prendre la dose indiquée de fer et acide folique pour éviter l'anémie; 4. Enrichir les repas, surtout pendant les 3 premiers mois de grossesse; 5. Consommer du sel iodé pour éviter un avortement spontané ou un accouchement prématuré; 6. Dormir sous une moustiquaire imprégnée et en prendre la dose indiquée de médicaments pour éviter le paludisme.

problem_behavior: Encourages prohibited food and the use of indigenous products during pregnancy;
promoted_behavior: Discourages prohibited food and the use of indigenous products during pregnancy. Assisting the pregnant woman in monitoring the four prenatal consultation visits
action: Discouragement of the use of prohibited food and indigenous products during pregnancy

message.English: Dear community members, immediately escort the pregnant woman to the nearest health center or hospital as soon as you observe any of the following signs: bleeding, convulsions, fever, loss of amniotic fluid, difficult breathing, severe headaches, severe pain in the lower abdomen, swelling of the face, hands or feet, disappearance or reduction of the baby's movements, disturbance of vision for the sake of your own care and that of your unborn child.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, accompagnez immédiatement la femme enceinte dans un Centre de Santé ou hôpital le plus proche dès que vous observez l’un des signes suivants : saignement, convulsions, fièvre, perte de liquide amniotique, respiration difficile, violents maux de tête, fortes douleurs au bas-ventre, gonflement de visage, des mains ou des pieds, disparition ou diminution des mouvements de bébé, trouble de la vue pour votre prise en charge et celle de votre futur bébé.

problem_behavior: Disregards pregnant women at the PNC.
promoted_behavior: Paying attention to the pregnant woman at prenatal consultations (PNC).
action: Promoting humanized care

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, give a friendly welcome and humanized care to all pregnant women to encourage them to continue with the use of your services.
message.French: Chers prestataires, réservez l’accueil convivial et les soins humanisés à toute femme enceinte pour l'encourager à continuer l'utilisation des services.

problem_behavior: Poor reception of pregnant women at the PNC.
promoted_behavior: Make the pregnant woman feel welcome at the prenatal consultation (PNC).
action: Discussion and implementation of the delivery plan with the pregnant woman at the PNC.

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, prioritize pregnant women to ensure appropriate emergency care and avoid complications.
message.French: Chers prestataires, faites le tri lors de l'accueil de la femme enceinte pour garantir les soins d'urgence appropriées et lui éviter les complications.

problem_behavior: 3/ Does not discuss the delivery plan with pregnant women at the PNC
promoted_behavior: Discusses delivery plan with pregnant women at the prenatal consultation (PNC).

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, discuss the birth plan with the pregnant woman during prenatal consultation (PNC) to ensure a safe delivery for the mother and newborn
message.French: Chers prestataires, discutez du plan d'accouchement avec la femme enceinte pendant la consultation pré-natale (CPN) pour préparer un accouchement sans danger pour la mère et le nouveau-né.

problem_behavior: Delay in coming to the facility at the first sign of labor
promoted_behavior: Decides to go to the facility on time at the first sign of labor
action: Decision to go to the facility at the first sign of labor

message.English: Dear pregnant women, as soon as one of the signs of labor appears, go immediately to the health facility for a safe delivery in order to receive quality care and guarantee the survival of your baby.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, dès l'apparition de l'un des signes de travail rendez-vous immédiatement dans   la formation sanitaire pour accoucher en toute sécurité afin de recevoir les soins de qualités et garantir la survie de votre bébé.

problem_behavior: Refusal to go to the facility for delivery.
promoted_behavior: Agrees to go to the facility for delivery;
action: No use of indigenous products to speed up labor.

message.English: Dear pregnant women, remind the healthcare provider of the contraceptive method you chose during PNC so that you can use it immediately after delivery
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, rappelez au prestataire la méthode contraceptive que vous avez choisi lors de la CPN pour en bénéficier immédiatement après l'accouchement.

problem_behavior: Use of indigenous products to speed up labor;
promoted_behavior: Do not use indigenous products to speed up labor
action: Decision to go to a health facility on time

message.English: Dear pregnant women in labor, avoid the use of inappropriate products not prescribed by the healthcare provider that expose you to delivery complications and death
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes en travail d’accouchement, évitez l'utilisation des produits inadéquats non prescrits par le prestataire qui vous exposent aux complications d’accouchement et au décès.

promoted_behavior: Go to a facility that is equipped for delivery.

message.English: Dear pregnant women, give birth in a well-equipped maternity hospital with qualified personnel to ensure quality care for you and your baby
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, accouchez dans une maternité équipée et en présence d'un personnel qualifié pour vous assurer des soins de qualité et ceux de votre bébé.

problem_behavior: Failure of healthcare provider to refer pregnant women in labor with a complication in time
promoted_behavior: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication is done by the healthcare provider.
action: Proper monitoring of a woman in labor

message.English: Clinical care providers, take the time to monitor a woman in labor to detect signs of complications in time to ensure proper management.
message.French: Chers prestataires cliniques, prenez votre temps d'assurer la surveillance d'une femme en travail afin de détecter à temps les signes de complication et d'assurer une prise en charge adéquate.

promoted_behavior: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication is done by the healthcare provider.

message.English: Clinical care providers, prompt referral in case of complications is important to ensure the survival of the pregnant woman and her unborn child.
message.French: Chers prestataires, il est important de référer la femme enceinte à temps en cas de complication pour garantir sa survie et celle de son futur bébé.

promoted_behavior: Prompt referral of pregnant women in labor with a complication by the healthcare provider.

message.English: Clinical care providers, Remember, prompt referral of pregnant women in case of complications is the key to quality care to ensure the survival of the woman and her unborn child
message.French: Chers prestataires cliniques, Attention, la référence à temps de la femme enceinte en cas de complication est l’élément clé des soins de qualité pour assurer la survie de la femme et de son futur bébé.

problem_behavior: Women in postpartum do not know the danger signs after delivery.
promoted_behavior: Women in postpartum know the danger signs after delivery.
action: Prompt consultation at the health center in case of any of the danger signs

message.English: WARNING! Dear women, after delivery, go to the nearest health center as soon as you notice any of the following signs (persistent bleeding, convulsion, fever and chills, foul-smelling vaginal discharge, headaches and anemia) to receive appropriate care
message.French: Chères accouchées, ATTENTION ! Chères femmes, après accouchement rendez-vous au centre de santé le plus proche dès que vous constatez l'un de signes ci-dessous (saignement persistant, convulsion, fièvre et frisson, perte vaginales malodorantes maux de tête et anémie) pour bénéficier de soins appropriés.

problem_behavior: Women in postpartum do not use a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward
promoted_behavior: Women in postpartum use a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward
action: Use of a contraceptive method before leaving the maternity ward

message.English: WARNING: Dear women, after delivery, use a contraceptive method of your choice after delivery and before leaving the maternity ward to avoid unwanted pregnancies and close pregnancies to ensure your well-being, that of your baby and your family
message.French: Chères accouchées, ATTENTION !  Chères femmes, après accouchement, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de votre choix après l'accouchement et avant de quitter la maternité pour éviter les grossesses non désirées et rapprochées afin d'assurer votre bien être, celui de votre bébé et de votre famille.

intervention: Consultation in time for comprehensive abortion care
problem_behavior: Women who carry unwanted pregnancies have clandestine abortions
promoted_behavior: Women with unwanted pregnancies receive comprehensive abortion care in appropriate facilities
action: Consultation in time for comprehensive abortion care

message.English: Dear pregnant women in need of comprehensive abortion care, go to the nearest health center to receive quality care
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes en cas de besoin des soins complets d’avortement, rendez-vous au centre de santé le plus proche pour y recevoir des soins de qualité.

intervention: Use of comprehensive abortion care services
problem_behavior: Women do not know the danger signs after abortion
promoted_behavior: Women know the danger signs after abortion
action: Use of comprehensive abortion care services

message.English: Dear pregnant women, use a contraceptive method of your choice after abortion to avoid an unwanted pregnancy
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de choix après l'avortement pour éviter une grossesse non désirée.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
problem_behavior: Women do not use contraception after abortion
promoted_behavior: Women choose to use contraception after abortion
action: Using contraception as an option after abortion

message.English: Dear women, use a contraceptive method of your choice after abortion to avoid an unwanted pregnancy and thrive
message.French: Chères femmes, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de choix après l'avortement pour éviter une grossesse non désirée et bien s’épanouir.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
problem_behavior: The healthcare provider does not give the correct information to women after abortion.
promoted_behavior: Healthcare providers properly inform women about comprehensive abortion care, benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception, etc.
action: Provide women with accurate information about comprehensive abortion care - benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, use safe and secure methods of uterine evacuation in case of abortion to avoid complications and ensure good health of the woman.
message.French: Chers prestataires, utilisez des méthodes sures et sécurisées d’évacuation utérine en cas d'avortement pour éviter les complications et garantir la bonne santé de femme.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
problem_behavior: Providers use obsolete uterine evacuation methods (curettage, forced cervical dilation, no pain management, etc.)
promoted_behavior: Healthcare providers use safe methods of uterine evacuation (Manual Intra-Uterine Aspiration, misoprostol, mifepristone, pain management, Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), para cervical block).
action: Use of safe methods of uterine evacuation (Manual Intra-Uterine Aspiration, misoprostol, mifepristone, pain management, AINS, para cervical block)

message.English: Dear healthcare provider, systematically administer a contraceptive method of choice to every woman who has had an abortion, to prevent pregnancy within six months of the abortion in order to prevent maternal morbidity and mortality.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement une méthode contraceptive de choix à chaque femme ayant connu un avortement, pour prévenir la survenue d’une grossesse dans les six mois après avortement afin de prévenir la morbi-mortalité maternelle.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
promoted_behavior: Healthcare providers always administer a contraceptive method to all women after abortion care.

message.English: Dear healthcare provider, systematically administer a contraceptive method of choice to every woman who has had an abortion, to prevent pregnancy within six months of the abortion in order to prevent maternal morbidity and mortality.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement une méthode contraceptive de choix à chaque femme ayant connu un avortement, pour prévenir la survenue d’une grossesse dans les six mois après avortement afin de prévenir la morbi-mortalité maternelle.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
problem_behavior: The community stigmatizes women who perform abortions
promoted_behavior: The community supports women with unwanted pregnancies for comprehensive abortion care
action: Provide the community with correct information on comprehensive abortion care, benefits, possible risks, importance of contraception, etc.

message.English: Dear community members, let's stand up and fight ignorance, misconceptions and fear towards women who have had abortions in order to avoid stigma, discrimination and rejection within the community
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, levons-nous et combattons l'ignorance, les fausses idées et la peur à l'endroit des femmes ayant avorté afin d’éviter la stigmatisation, la discrimination et le rejet au sein de la communauté.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
problem_behavior: The community is not fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services (SCACF)
promoted_behavior: The community is fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services centered on women.
action: Provide correct information about free comprehensive abortion care services

message.English: Dear community members, kindly escort any woman who has had an abortion to the nearest health center to receive quality care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, accompagnez toute femme ayant connue l’avortement au centre de santé le plus proche pour y recevoir des soins de qualité.

intervention: Using contraception as an option after abortion
promoted_behavior: The community is fully informed about the availability of free comprehensive abortion care services centered on women.

message.English: Dear community members, abortion care services are important and available, for all cases of unsafe abortion go to the health center to receive appropriate care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, les services de soins d’avortement sont importants disponibles, pour tous cas d'avortement non sécurisé rendez-vous au centre de santé pour recevoir les soins appropriés.

problem_behavior: Does not provide the newborn with basic care
promoted_behavior: Healthcare provider always provides the newborn with complete basic care.
action: Systematic administration of complete basic care to the newborn

message.English: Dear providers, always provide the newborn with complete basic care for good survival.
message.French: Chers prestataires, administrez systématiquement les soins essentiels complet au Nouveau-né pour lui permettre une bonne survie.

problem_behavior: Does not exclusively breastfeed the baby
promoted_behavior: The mother exclusively breastfeeds the baby.
action: Exclusive breastfeeding

message.English: Dear mothers, exclusively breastfeed your baby after delivery to ensure good health and prevent a close pregnancy.
message.French: Chères accouchées/chères femmes, après accouchement allaitez exclusivement votre bébé au sein afin de lui assurer la bonne santé et prévenir une grossesse   rapprochée.

promoted_behavior: The mother exclusively breastfeeds the baby.

message.English: Dear parents, breast milk is the only natural, complete and adapted food for your baby, exclusively breastfeed him from birth until he is six months old.
message.French: Chers parents, le lait maternel est le seul aliment naturel, complet et adapté à votre bébé, nourrissez-le exclusivement au sein dès la naissance jusqu’à l’âge de six mois.

problem_behavior: Do not sleep under the LLIN, leaving the baby exposed to bad weather
promoted_behavior: The mother and the baby sleep under the Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN).
action: Proper use of the LLIN

message.English: Dear parents, sleeping under Long-lasting Insecticidal Net (LLIN) every night will protect you and your family from bites of mosquitoes that transmit malaria.
message.French: Chers parents, dormez et faites dormir, chaque nuit, tous les membres de votre famille sous la Moustiquaire imprégnée d’insecticide à Longue Durée (MILD) pour les protéger contre les piqûres des moustiques qui transmettent la Malaria.

problem_behavior: Do not go to the HC as soon as the newborn shows danger signs
promoted_behavior: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.
action: Taking care of the newborn at home (protecting the baby from heat, cold and dressing the baby

message.English: Dear parents, bring your baby immediately to the health center as soon as you detect any of the following infant danger signs: refusal to suck, moving less or being inactive, non-stop crying, fever, breathing difficulties and diarrhea, cough, cold, convulsions...
message.French: Chers parents, amenez immédiatement votre bébé au centre de santé dès que vous décelez ne serait-ce qu’un des signes de danger suivants du nourrisson : refus de téter, bouge moins ou est inactif, pleures incessantes, fièvre, difficultés respiratoires et diarrhée, toux, rhume, convulsions.

promoted_behavior: Protects the baby from bad weather.

message.English: Dear parents, take good care of the newborn at home, protect the baby against heat, smoke, cold and dress him properly to ensure his healthy growth and avoid illness
message.French: Chers parents, prenez bien soins du nouveau-né à la maison, protégez le contre la chaleur, la fumée, le froid et habillez-le convenablement afin de lui garantir une bonne croissance et lui éviter de tomber malade.

promoted_behavior: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.

message.English: Take your baby to the health center immediately if any of the following infant danger signs are detected. The infant is having convulsions, has a distended abdomen or is vomiting whatever he or she swallows, has a foul odor around the navel or the cord is red.
message.French: Amenez immédiatement votre bébé au centre de santé dès que vous décelez ne serait-ce qu’un des signes de danger suivants du nourrisson. Le nourrisson a des convulsions, a un abdomen distendu ou vomit tout ce qu’il avale, a une odeur nauséabonde au niveau de son nombril ou la du cordon est rouge.

promoted_behavior: Go to healthcare facility as soon as the newborn shows signs of danger.

message.English: Dear parents, as soon as your child is having convulsions, repeated vomiting, refuses to suck or eat, or goes into comma, take him/her immediately to the referral health center or hospital for appropriate care.
message.French: Chers parents, dès que votre enfant convulse, vomis à répétition, refuse de téter ou de manger ou entre en comma, amenez-le immédiatement au Centre de Santé de référence ou à l'hôpital pour y recevoir des soins appropriés.

promoted_behavior: Wash hands before and after nursing the newborn.

message.English: Dear mother, wash your hands before and after nursing the newborn.
message.French: Chères femmes, lavez-vous les mains avant et après les soins du nouveau-né.

target_audience: Sexually active woman of childbearing age, married or not
problem_behavior: Unwanted pregnancies
promoted_behavior: Women of childbearing age use contraception of their choice
action: Use of contraceptive method of choice.

message.English: Dear women of childbearing age, use a contraceptive method of your choice to avoid too many early and late pregnancies to ensure your health and your family well-being.
message.French: Chères femmes en âge de procréer, utilisez une méthode contraceptive de votre choix pour éviter les grossesses trop nombreuses, trop rapprochées, trop précoces et trop tardives pour assurer votre santé et le bien-être familial.

target_audience: Sexually active woman of childbearing age, married or not
problem_behavior: Practice of clandestine abortions 3/ Pregnancies that are too close.
promoted_behavior: Women use contraception of their choice after abortion

message.English: WARNING: Get informed about contraceptive methods from trained providers and health facilities to help you make an informed choice and use a safe and appropriate method * Dear partners, encourage your wives to use the contraceptive methods of their choice for their health and family well-being * Dear women of childbearing age, use a modern contraceptive method of your choice to avoid resorting to unsafe abortions
message.French: Chères femmes en âge de procréer ATTENTION  bénéficiez des informations sur les méthodes contraceptives auprès des prestataires formés et dans les FOSA pour vous aider à faire le choix éclairé et utiliser une méthode sur et adapté. Chers partenaires, encouragez  vos femmes à utiliser les méthodes contraceptives de leurs choix pour leur santé et le bien-être familial. Chères femmes en âge de procréer, utilisez une méthode contraceptive moderne de votre choix pour éviter de recourir aux avortements non sécurisés.

promoted_behavior: The mother complies with the vaccination schedule.

message.English: 1. We should vaccinate our children at birth, 1.5 months, 2.5 months, 3.5 months and 9 months to protect them against tuberculosis, polio, diphtheria, pertussis, hepatitis B, meningitis, pneumonia, yellow fever and measles.
message.French: 1. Faisons vacciner nos enfants à la naissance, à 1 mois et demi, à 2 et demi ; à 3 et demi et à 9 mois pour les protéger   contre la Tuberculose, la polio, la diphtérie, la coqueluche, l'hépatite B, la méningite, la pneumonie, la fièvre jaune et la rougeole.

promoted_behavior: The mother complies with the vaccination schedule.

message.English: 2. We should respect the 5 free vaccination appointments to guarantee the good health of our children from 0 to 11 months.
message.French: 2. Respectons les 5 rendez-vous de vaccination gratuite pour garantir la bonne santé de nos enfants de 0 à 11 mois.

promoted_behavior: The mother complies with the vaccination schedule.

message.English: 3. Have your child vaccinated 5 times before his or her first birthday to protect against vaccine-preventable diseases.
message.French: 3. Faites vacciner votre enfant 5 fois avant son premier anniversaire pour le protéger contre les maladies évitables par la vaccination.

problem_behavior: Discontinuation of the method due to side effects or rumors
promoted_behavior: Women with side effects consult a qualified provider before discontinuing the method
action: Timely consultation at the health center in case of side effects that bother the woman

message.English: WARNING: in case of side effects that bother you, go to the health center and immediately consult a trained provider to benefit from the appropriate care.
message.French: Chères utilisatrices des méthodes contraceptives ATTENTION en cas des effets secondaires qui vous gênent rendez-vous au centre de santé et consulté immédiatement un prestataire formé pour bénéficier des soins appropriés.

intervention: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
problem_behavior: The pregnant woman is not adequately informed at the PNC about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.
promoted_behavior: The pregnant woman is adequately informed at the prenatal consultation (PNC) about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.
action: Informing pregnant women about the use of contraceptive methods

message.English: Dear pregnant women, go to prenatal consultations. In addition to monitoring your pregnancy, you will get information and counseling on contraceptive methods to use immediately after delivery. This will allow you to avoid the occurrence of an unwanted pregnancy, ensure good health and family well-being. Warning: Ask the provider about contraceptive options to be used immediately after delivery to avoid early pregnancy and ensure your health, your baby's health, and your family's well-being.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, allez à la CPN. En plus du suivi de votre grossesse, vous bénéficierez des informations et des conseils sur les méthodes contraceptives à utiliser immédiatement après l’accouchement. Cela vous permettra d’éviter la survenue d'une grossesse non désirée, garantir la bonne santé et le bien-être familial. Chères femmes enceintes, Attention! sollicitez auprès du prestataire les options contraceptives à utiliser immédiatement après l'accouchement pour éviter la survenue d'une grossesse trop rapprochée et garantir votre santé, celle de votre bébé et le bien-être de votre famille.

intervention: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
promoted_behavior: The pregnant woman is adequately informed at the prenatal consultation (PNC) about the importance of using contraceptive methods after delivery.

message.English: Dear pregnant women, using a safe and effective contraceptive method after delivery helps you ensure the development and health of the mother-child couple and the well-being of the entire family.
message.French: Chères femmes enceintes, l'utilisation d'une méthode contraceptive sûre et efficace après l'accouchement vous aide à garantir l'épanouissement, la santé du couple mère-enfant et le bien-être de toute la famille.

intervention: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
target_audience: Healthcare provider to women in labor in the latency phase
problem_behavior: The healthcare provider does not check with the woman in labor for information on the choice of contraception
promoted_behavior: Healthcare provider checks with the woman in labor for information on contraceptive choice
action: Systematic checking of information on prior contraceptive choice with the woman in labor

message.English: WARNING: Always check the information on the choice of contraception with the woman in labor so that she can benefit from the chosen method at the prenatal consultation (PNC) if necessary.
message.French: Chers prestataires, ATTENTION! vérifiez systématiquement l'information sur le choix préalable de la contraception auprès de la femme en travail pour lui permettre de bénéficier de la méthode choisie à la consultation pré-natale (CPN) le cas échant.

intervention: Use of contraceptive methods in the postpartum period
target_audience: Healthcare provider to women in labor in the latency phase
problem_behavior: ealthcare providers do not give contraceptive counseling to women in labor
promoted_behavior: Healthcare provider gives contraceptive counseling to the woman in labor
action: Systematic initiation of contraceptive counseling for women in labor who have not yet chosen a contraceptive method

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, initiate contraceptive counseling with the woman in labor so that she can benefit from a method of her choice for her health, her baby's health and the family's well-being
message.French: Chers prestataires, initiez le counseling sur la contraception auprès de la femme en travail d’accouchement afin qu'elle bénéficie d'une méthode de son choix pour sa santé, celle de son bébé et le bien-être de familial.

target_audience: Survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV)
problem_behavior: Do not denounce the damage suffered
promoted_behavior: Report any case of violence
action: Reporting all cases of rape

message.English: I, a survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV), denounce the abuses I suffered, demand proper care and prosecution of the perpetrator.
message.French: Moi, survivant des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre, je dénonce les abus dont j'ai fait l'objet, demande une prise en charge correcte et les poursuites de mon bourreau.

problem_behavior: Stigmatizes the victim of sexual violence
promoted_behavior: Stop stigmatizing the victim of sexual violence
action: Promotion of care services for survivors of SGBV victims

message.English: Dear community members, DO NOT stigmatize survivors of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV). Encourage them to report and assist them in getting better care.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, ATTENTION! Evitez de stigmatiser les survivants des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre. Encouragez-les à dénoncer et accompagnez-les pour une meilleure prise en charge.

problem_behavior: Fails to provide timely and appropriate care to the survivor of SGBV.
promoted_behavior: Provides timely and appropriate care to the survivor of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV).
action: Holistic care for survivors of SGBV.

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, listen to survivors of Sexual and Gender-Based Violence (SGBV) and provide them with adequate care to facilitate their social reintegration.
message.French: Chers prestataires, écoutez-les, offrez aux survivants des violences sexuelles basées sur le genre une prise en charge adéquate pour faciliter leur réinsertion sociale.

problem_behavior: Harmful and inappropriate practices (non-use of partograms during labor monitoring, Christeller maneuver, ...)
promoted_behavior: Applies recommended practices (use of partograms during labor monitoring, ...)
action: Application of recommended practices to save women's lives (use of partograms during labor monitoring, ...)

message.English: Dear healthcare providers, please follow recommended practices in the management of women in labor. Use partograms during labor monitoring to avoid complications and death of mother and baby.
message.French: Chers prestataires, veuillez à l'application des pratiques recommandées dans la prise en charge des femmes en travail d’accouchement. Utilisez des partogrammes pendant la surveillance du travail d’accouchement pour éviter les complications et le décès de la mère et de son bébé.

problem_behavior: Fistula patients hide and are ashamed
promoted_behavior: Do not hide, go to the health facility for appropriate care.
action: Consultation in health facilities to benefit from fistula repair

message.English: Dear women with urogenital fistulas, come out of hiding to receive proper care and improve your health.
message.French: Chères porteuses de fistules urogénitales, sortez de la clandestinité pour recevoir les soins appropriés et améliorer votre état de santé.

problem_behavior: Stigmatization of fistula patients
promoted_behavior: Stop stigmatizing urogenital fistula patients.
action: Assisting patients with urogenital fistulas in the repair process

message.English: Dear community members, DO NOT stigmatize patients with urogenital fistulas, but encourage them to seek medical attention and provide timely support for the repair process so that they can regain their well-being.
message.French: Chers membres de la communauté, ATTENTION! Evitez de stigmatiser les porteuses des fistules urogénitales, par contre encouragez-les à consulter et accompagnez-les à temps pour la réparation afin de retrouver le bien-être.
